name: BitOnyx
description: BitOnyx AI - is a fully automated AI cryptocurrency trading platform. A feature of the system is its openness - trading is carried out according to automatically-generated daily forecasts, which are available to any user through the app. Users can compare the current forecasts for specific pairs with the real market situation directly in the application. Users can carry out trading without a platform, or delegate this right to an automated platform The platform has its own token called BTNYX. This is an utility token which gives access to the platform services. The BitOnyx token is fuel the operations of the BitOnyx trading system and its ecosystem. It supports multiple utilities on the BitOnyx enviropment which includes paying for trading fees, CCF app supscription fees, referal rewards and any other fees on the BitOnyx trading system
